message: Hi Bob, I'm interested in selling this product. I think it would be perfect for you. I'm asking for $10,000.
Hi Alice, thank you for offering the product. I appreciate your suggestion, but I am only able to pay up to $8,000 for it. Would you consider accepting this offer?
Hi Bob, I understand your position, but the product is worth more to me than that. Would you be willing to meet in the middle at $9,000?
Hello Alice, thank you for your response. I appreciate your offer, but I am still unable to meet at $9,000. I am willing to go up to $8,500 for the product. Would this be acceptable?
